sentences.en: Five whole pages of script were devoted to rubbishing her political opponents.
sentences.cn: 整整5页讲稿都是对她的政敌的诋毁。

sentences.en: He became Vivien Leigh's devoted friend and comforter.
sentences.cn: 他成了费雯丽忠诚的朋友和给她安慰的人。

sentences.en: He devoted his energies to the reformation of science.
He was single-mindedly devoted to the hastening of freedom for the oppressed.
sentences.cn: 他一心一意致力于早日让被压迫者获得自由。

sentences.en: I have personally been devoted to this cause for many years.
sentences.cn: 多年来我个人一直一心扑在这项事业上。

sentences.en: I was a devoted train spotter.
sentences.cn: 我是个酷爱看火车的人。

sentences.en: Joyce Bryt is a devoted Star Trek fan.
sentences.cn: 乔伊丝·布赖特是《星际迷航》的狂热粉丝。

sentences.en: She re-mained devoted to his memory.
She was devoted to him, but she no longer loved him madly.
sentences.cn: 她一心一意地爱他，但是这份爱不再疯狂。

sentences.en: She was just playing the devoted mother.
sentences.cn: 她只是装得像个尽心尽责的母亲似的。

sentences.en: The magazine is devoted to anato-mizing the inadequacies of liberalism.
sentences.cn: 该杂志致力于剖析自由主义的不足之处。

sentences.en: The shop is devoted to a new range of accessories.
sentences.cn: 该商店专营新的一系列配件。

sentences.en: They are devoted to their children.
sentences.cn: 他们深爱着自己的孩子。

sentences.en: They devoted their entire airtime to covering the storm.
sentences.cn: 他们一直在全程播报这场暴风雨。

sentences.en: They seemed devoted to each other and were openly affectionate.
sentences.cn: 他们看起来非常恩爱，柔情蜜意溢于言表。

words.tran_cn: 虔诚的，祷告的；信仰的；献身的

trans.tran_cn: 献身的，忠诚的，挚爱的，专心的
trans.tran_en: giving someone or something a lot of love and attention

trans.tran_cn: 献身于…，致力于…(devote的过去分词)
